com.frostphyr.avail

Class ArrayUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.frostphyr.avail.ArrayUtils

  • public class ArrayUtils
extends Object
    A class containing various utility methods relating to arrays.
    Since:
    1.5

      • asList

        @SafeVarargs
public static <T> List<T> asList(T... array)
        Returns a List backed by array. Any changes to the List will be made to array. The List has a fixed size, so any operations that modify the size will throw UnsupportedOperationException.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of array and the returned List
        Parameters:
        array - the array to create a List for
        Returns:
        a List backed by array
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if array is null
